item.title: Lenovo issues global recall for Thinkpad batteries
item.description: Lenovo has expanded a battery recall that was first announced on March 27, 2014. This recall now includes all affected lithium-ion batteries globally. The batteries, as announced in late April 2015, were manufactured for ThinkPad notebook computers shipped between February 2010 and June 2012. Lenovo stated that they are offering free-of-charge replacement batteries for all recalled batteries in the interest of public safety.
